descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

connectorId.name: connectorId
connectorId.description: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
connectorId.ai_hint: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

connectorType.name: connectorType
connectorType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

issueType.name: issueType
issueType.description: Type of the Jira issue to create for this case

priority.name: priority
priority.description: Priority of the Jira issue to create for this case
priority.ai_hint: Priority of the Jira issue to create for this case

urgency.name: urgency
urgency.description: Urgency of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
urgency.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

severity.name: severity
severity.description: Severity of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
severity.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

impact.name: impact
impact.description: Impact of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
impact.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

category.name: category
category.description: Category of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
category.ai_hint: Category of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case

issueTypes.name: issueTypes
issueTypes.description: Comma-separated list of numerical types of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case

severityCode.name: severityCode
severityCode.description: Severity code of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case
severityCode.ai_hint: Severity code of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: owner
options.description: Valid application owner registered within the Cases Role Based Access Control system

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: tags
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

sortOptions.name: sortOptions
sortOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

comment.name: comment
comment.description: Text to replace current comment message
comment.ai_hint: Text to replace current comment message

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

tag.name: tag
tag.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tag.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

name.name: name
name.description: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient)
name.ai_hint: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient)

apiUrl.name: apiUrl
apiUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

apiToken.name: apiToken
apiToken.ai_hint: 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'connectorId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'connectorType'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.jira' THEN SHOW parameter 'issueType'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.jira' THEN SHOW parameter 'priority'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'urgency'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'severity'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'impact'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'category'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.resilient' THEN SHOW parameter 'issueTypes'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.resilient' THEN SHOW parameter 'severityCode'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'sortOptions'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'caseComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'comment'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'comment'
IF resource == 'caseComment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'caseTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'caseTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'tag'
IF resource == 'caseTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'caseTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'tag'
IF resource == 'connector' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'connectorType'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'apiUrl'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.jira' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.jira' THEN SHOW parameter 'apiToken'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.jira' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectKey'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'username'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.servicenow' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.resilient' THEN SHOW parameter 'apiKeyId'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.resilient' THEN SHOW parameter 'apiKeySecret'
IF resource == 'connector' AND operation == 'create' AND connectorType == '.resilient' THEN SHOW parameter 'orgId'
